gw.api.web

Class PebblesUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.web.PebblesUtil

  • public class PebblesUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for dealing with Pebbles. This is a good place for work-arounds for issues that cannot or will not be resolved at the platform level.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PebblesUtil()

      static void invalidateIterators(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Location location, IType iteratorType)
      Deprecated. 
      (Since Bedrock or maybe Borax) This isn't deprecated in the truest sense. We still use it all the time, and don't have a good alternative for it. But we want to discourage use if we can help it. SIDE EFFECT: Calling this method may result in inconsistent or undesirable UI behavior, and bypass UI level validation on data changes. USE WITH EXTREME CAUTION.

    • Method Detail

      • addWebMessages

        public static void addWebMessages(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Location location,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> messages)
        Adds messages to the specified Location for display in the UI. One WebMessage at the WebMessage.Severity.WARNING level will be added for each string contained in messages.
        Parameters:
        location - The UI location on which to add the messages.
        messages - The messages to show

      • invalidateIterators

        @Deprecated
public static void invalidateIterators(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Location location,
                                  IType iteratorType)
        Deprecated. (Since Bedrock or maybe Borax) This isn't deprecated in the truest sense. We still use it all the time, and don't have a good alternative for it. But we want to discourage use if we can help it. SIDE EFFECT: Calling this method may result in inconsistent or undesirable UI behavior, and bypass UI level validation on data changes. USE WITH EXTREME CAUTION.

        Works around Pebbles refresh issues related to failure to reload modified iterator. Call this method to refresh all iterators of the given type on the given location.

        Parameters:
        location - affects iterators on this location
        iteratorType - affects iterators of this type

      • goToWizardStep

        public static void goToWizardStep(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.wizard.Wizard wizard,
                  java.lang.String stepName)
        Navigates to the given step within the given wizard. Will throw an exception if the given step is currently visible
        Parameters:
        wizard - The wizard to navigate to
        stepName - The step on the given wizard to navigate to

      • getWizardVariable

        public static java.lang.Object getWizardVariable(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.wizard.Wizard wizard,
                                 java.lang.String variableName)
        Retrieves a wizard variable
        Parameters:
        wizard - to retrieve from
        variableName - to retrieve
        Returns:
        value of variable
